title: 5 Pairs Natural Bamboo Reusable Chopsticks with Gift Box, Non-slip Chopstick Gift Set for Sushi Rice Noodles, Chinese Japanese Tableware Dishwasher Safe, 8.86 Inches/22.5 cm, Ice Crack
descriptions:
Title: 5 Pairs Natural Bamboo Reusable Chopsticks with Gift Box – Ice Crack Japanese Design, 8.86 in (22.5 cm), Non-Slip, Dishwasher Safe, BPA-Free

Overview:
Elevate every meal with a beautifully crafted set of 5 pairs of reusable bamboo chopsticks. Featuring an elegant Ice Crack pattern inspired by Japanese tradition, these lightweight yet sturdy chopsticks offer superior grip, everyday durability, and a refined presentation in a ready-to-gift box.

Key Features:
- Natural Bamboo Construction: Strong, dense, and water resistant for long-lasting, everyday use.
- Safe and Healthy: BPA-free, paint-free, and wax-free finish; no coatings, no odors.
- Non-Slip Design: Textured tips enhance grip for noodles, sushi, rice, dumplings, and more.
- Dishwasher Safe: Easy to clean and maintain; resists swelling and deformation.
- Lightweight and Sturdy: Comfortable to hold for all hand sizes; balanced for precise control.
- Anti-Rust and Eco-Friendly: Sustainably sourced bamboo with zero metal or plastic components.
- Elegant Ice Crack Pattern: Exquisite Japanese-style top design adds a premium touch to the table.
- Versatile Use: Ideal for home, office, restaurant, and hotel settings.

Specifications:
- Quantity: 5 pairs
- Material: Natural bamboo
- Length: 8.86 inches (22.5 cm)
- Pattern/Color: Ice Crack
- Finish: No paint, no wax
- Care: Dishwasher safe; hand-wash recommended for longest life

Perfect For:
- Meals: Sushi, udon, ramen, noodles, fried rice, dumplings, and a wide range of Asian dishes.
- Gifting: Thoughtful gift set for lovers of Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Vietnamese, and other Asian cuisines.

What’s in the Box:
- 5 pairs of natural bamboo chopsticks with Ice Crack design
- Premium gift box for storage or gifting

Bring elegance, comfort, and sustainability to your dining experience with this reusable bamboo chopstick set—crafted for daily use and designed to impress.
